body_html:
Hi Thanks for following up. I could not resolve the issue and the only option which worked for me was installing Cuda 8!
On Tue, Jul 31, 2018 at 3:13 PM Alfred Sorten Wolf ***@***.***> wrote: It has been 14 days with no activity and the awaiting response label was assigned. Is this still an issue? — You are receiving this because you are subscribed to this thread. Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub <#20783 (comment)>, or mute the thread <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AMimrKGpyXGwPqJz9IJmc8slFxNB4p1Wks5uMKxdgaJpZM4VPLCC> .
-- Regards Solale Tabarestani

Hi

Thanks for following up.
I could not resolve the issue and the only option which worked for me was
installing Cuda 8!
